mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SILVERBOARD( SB_SEQ, USERID, SEACH_SEQ, SBTITLE, SBWRITE, SBDATE )VALUES( SB_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userid}, #{seach_seq}, #{sbtitle}, #{sbwrite}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT SB_SEQ, SBTITLE, SBWRITE, USERID, TO_CHAR(SBDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') SBDATE FROM SILVERBOARD WHERE SB_SEQ=#{sb_seq}
SELECT SB_SEQ, SBTITLE, USERID, TO_CHAR(SBDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') SBDATE FROM SILVERBOARD WHERE SEACH_SEQ = #{seach_seq} ORDER BY SBDATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(SEACH_SEQ) FROM SILVERBOARD WHERE SEACH_SEQ = #{seach_seq}
